title: AMD Radeon RX 7600 XT Linux Performance Review
text: The RadeonSI open-source OpenGL driver has been well optimized for SPECViewPerf over the years and delivers a great showing on the consumer Radeon graphics cards and delivering great competitiveness to the NVIDIA proprietary driver. The Radeon graphics cards also showed very strong performance against NVIDIA on Linux within the ParaView workstation visualization software package.
